name: Aegis
effect: React: Before target character in this rank suffers wounds: Reduce the wounds by two. The target gains DEFEND +10 until end of turn.
"Otherworldly crows roost amongst the Storm's clouds. Faith alone keeps them there." - Niobe

name: Amatria Tansiq
effect:
Elf • Assassin / Tansiq
React: Before target opposing character kills Amatria with a strike or action: The target must succeed with a poison check (DC 12) or suffer a wound.
"Her face is a true work of art." - The Lady of Pain

name: Axe of Fury
effect:
Weapon • POWERATTACK +2
React: Once per turn, before target opposing character is killed with a melee strike by this fighter: This fighter gains a bonus to ATK and AC equal to the target's Level until end of turn.

name: Azam
effect:
Mercenary
If your Warlord is a Mercenary, Azam gains RIDING +4.
Azam may equip Steeds regardless of class restrictions.
"Yes I can break these beasts in for you. At a price, of course."

name: Backstab
effect: React: Before this rogue makes a melee strike roll: If the target of the strike is spent, this rogue gains +5 ATK for this strike and the strike inflicts an additional wound.
"Why don't they e'er look behind them?" - Talin Tzin

name: Ballista Crew
effect:
Nothrog • Siege
May not attack.
Spend Order: Stun Ballista Crew: Perform a +3 ranged strike that inflicts an additional wound and ignores any AC bonus from Armor, Shield, or Helm items.
"Getting the right kind of wood is the trick, not the blueprint." - Scyrax

name: Barrett Yscar
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Lycanthrope
Barrett is both a fighter and a rogue.
Barrett enters play as if he were Level 4.
Order: Once per game: Until end of game, Barett gains +5 ATK and +1 HP, has an additional melee strike (base +0 ATK) when he attacks, and his items are considered blank.

name: Blacksand Trap
effect:
Trap
React: After target character targets a character in this rank with a melee strike, spend and stun Blacksand Trap: The target must succeed with a dexterity save (DC 15, DC 20 if this character is a Dwarf) or suffer a wound and become stunned.

name: Blind Vengeance
effect: Spend React: Before this character is killed: The next melee strike performed by a character you control this turn gains +5 ATK and inflicts an additional wound.
"Make them pay. Make them all pay." - the last words of Spencer Latham

name: Brine Fiend
effect: Mercenary • Monster
"Don't make any sudden moves, or we're all dead." - Angus Hammerfall

name: Camel
effect:
Steed
Order: Spend Camel: Move this character either forward one rank or to another position in this rank.
Order: Once per turn, spend Camel: Ready a non-stunned item of Level 5 or less equipped to this character.

name: Celestial Flame
effect:
Weapon
This character inflicts an additional wound whenever he hits with an odd melee strike roll.
Righteousness bound in solid form, burning with an uncertain fire.

name: Chime of the Aerie
effect:
React: Before target stunned character moves forward or backward, spend Chime of the Aerie: The target suffers a wound. This is an Air action.
Spend Order: Ready a non-stunned item or spend a ready item.

name: Cloudracer
effect:
Steed
Order: Discard a card from your hand: Move forward or backward one rank.
Order: Spend Cloudracer: Move forward or backward one rank.
"She's been with me since the start. The nearest thing I have to family now." - Logan

name: Conjure Storm
effect:
Earth • Air
Spend Order: Perform a +8 ranged strike that inflicts an additional wound. Perform a +4 ranged strike against a target three or more ranks away.
"Those who know how to manipulate the power of the desert are not to be trifled with, as they can strike anywhere they wish." - Azam

name: Disintegrate
effect: Order: Target an unwounded character within two ranks: Succeed with a Skill check (DC = target's AC) to inflict one wound on the target or destroy an item equipped by the target.
"A bad spell. It leaves nothing to raise." - Jevae

name: Genecourt Initiate
effect:
Deverenian • Seer
React: Before Genecourt Initiate is killed: The next strike this turn against a character you contol is a Critical Failure.
"All this sand gets into my eyes. The future does not promise anything else, my liege."

name: Griffon of Misear
effect:
Steed
Order: Spend Griffon of Misear: Move forward one rank.
React: Before this fighter falls forward to fix an illegal rank, spend Griffon of Misear: This fighter does not spend or stun before moving.
Flying cavalry are impressive, provided they don't stray too near the Storm.

name: Gunda
effect:
Nothrog • Barbarian
React: Once per turn, before Gunda suffers wounds: Gunda gains +5 ATK, +1 HP and +1 Level until end of turn.
"See? I am hardly bleeding. Now let me try."

name: Han of the Ferry
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Bard • Lycanthrope • RIPOSTE +7
Han is a cleric and a rogue and enters play as if he were Level 4.
Other Free Kingdoms in a rank with one or more Han gain +2 to all die rolls.

name: Healing Potion
effect:
A character may not equip more than one Healing Potion per game.
Order: Destroy Healing Potion: Remove one wound from a character in this rank.
React: Before target character in this rank suffers wounds, destroy Healing Potion: Reduce the wounds to zero.

name: Hod's Legacy
effect:
Weapon • Unique
Spend Order: Spend Hod's Legacy: Ready target lower Level spent (not stunned) character of the same faction.
Order: Spend Hod's Legacy: Unstun target lower Level character of the same faction.
"But Hod has deserted us, how can they...?" - Hallur

name: Icy Surge
effect:
Water
Order: Perform a +5 ranged strike. After the strike, the target must succeed with a Magic save (DC 12) or become spent.
Spend Order: Perform a +8 ranged strike. After the strike, the target must succeed with a Magic save (DC 5 + this wizard's Skill) or become stunned.

name: Incinerate
effect:
Fire
Order: Perform a +6 ranged strike.
Spend Order: Perform two +9 ranged strikes.
"No, Castus. The power the jester has given me is more than real. It is as if the door to another realm has opened." - Yavlo the Kindled

name: Judge Aeacus
effect:
Mercenary • Paladin
While performing a melee strike against a character of opposite alignment Aeacus gains +3 ATK and the strike inflicts an additional wound.
Order: Discard a card from your hand: Switch Aeacus' alignment permanently. Any player may perform this action.

name: Ka-Nissus
effect:
Mercenary • Monster • POWERATTACK +7 / Sutek
Order: Once per game, target an opposing character: Until end of game, Ka-Nissus inflicts an additional wound against the target. If Ka-Nissus kills the target, remove all wounds from him.

name: Kor's Patience
effect: Order: Perform a +5 ranged strike that does not inflict wounds. If the strike hits, stun the target.
"...has its limits." - Wall

name: Massacre
effect: React: After this fighter performs a melee strike that killed an opposing character, target any characters that were adjacent to the target of the strike: Each target must succeed with a dexterity save (DC 5 + this fighter's primary ATK) or suffer a wound.

name: Master Naxagoras
effect:
The Chosen
Naxagoras is a fighter and a wizard.
Naxagoras enters play as if he were Level 4.
Your Thralls gain +1 ATK.
Order: Once per game, kill a Thrall: Naxagoras permanently gains either +6 ATK and POWERATTACK +6 or +1 Level for casting spells and +5 Skill.

name: Meet at the Inn
effect: Order: All players may draw a card. You may draw an additional card (two total).
"It is of utmost importance that you succeed." - King Dukat

name: Minor Miracle
effect:
Your characters may only perform one Minor Miracle from your hand each turn.
React: Before target character suffers wounds: Reduce the wounds by one.

name: Mo'can
effect:
Nothrog • Scout
Spend Order: Perform two +4 ranged strikes.
React: Once per turn, after an opposing character moves without spending or stunning: Mo'can moves forward one rank or performs a +7 ranged strike.

name: Nightmare Blade
effect:
Weapon
While performing a melee strike, this rogue inflicts an additional wound against a stunned character and gains +3 ATK against a spent character.
"It twists and torments the unwary soul, damning it for all eternity. It should not heedlessly be wielded. Better you throw it back in!" - Reese

name: Okull the Defiant
effect:
Deverenian • Illusionist • MAGIC RESISTANCE +3
Okull is a fighter and a wizard and enters play as if Level 4.
Order: Once per turn, after Okull is targeted with a strike or action: Make a MAGIC RESISTANCE check (DC 16) to cancel the strike or action.
Order: Once per turn: Perform a ranged strike with a bonus equal to the number of action cards in your discard pile.

name: Oloidynatos
effect:
The Chosen • Daemon • Planar
May cast cleric and wizard spells.
Order: Once per turn, kill a Thrall: Ready Oloidynatos.
"Not all of them are just vicious beasts. Some have innate abilities." - Samanya

name: Once Again
effect: Order: Remove this card from the game: Retrieve a fighter action card from your discard pile and put it into your hand.
"Each time, the degenerate and unjust escape my wrath. No more. I shall strike against The Chosen." - Kerebrus

name: Outmatched
effect: React: After target opposing character enters play in the front rank or moves into the front rank: If this character is in the front rank, perform a melee strike against the target.
"E'en with our empire lost, thou still canst not compare." - Squire Fastus

name: Pagophoros
effect:
The Chosen • Planar • Daemon
Opposing stunned characters within one rank of one or more Pagophoros must succeed with a magic save (DC 13) to unstun.
React: After Pagophoros enters play, kill one or more ready Thralls: Move forward an equal number of ranks. Permanently gain +1 HP.
"Takes true heroes to get rid of them." - Kohn

name: Profit
effect:
Dwarf • Assassin • STEALTH +8
While in an opposing formation, Profit gains +4 Levels for equipping items.
"Look here. No more mercenaries for this army, I'd wager."

name: Remorna
effect:
Elf / Vaneris
Order: Once per turn, attach a card from your discard pile face down to Remorna: Perform a +4 ranged strike. This is a Water action and a spell.
React: Before Remorna is killed: Reveal all face down cards attached to Remorna. Shuffle all revealed spells into your deck. Remove all other revealed cards from the game.

name: Revigorate
effect: Spend Order: Ready target equal or lower Level non-stunned character you control.
"Get up and fight!" - Mentor

name: Ring of the Savant
effect:
SCRIBE +4
This cleric gains +1 Level for scribing and casting spells.
Scribed spells cast by this cleric are removed from the game.
Order: Once per turn: Choose a cleric spell in your discard pile and succeed with a SCRIBE check (DC 22) to retrieve and attach the spell as if scribed.

name: Ring of Vorn
effect: Order: Spend Ring of Vorn, target a character in this rank: Move the target forward or backward one rank.
"Vorn was our greatest assassin, utilizing magic to speed his kills." - Amatria Tansiq

name: Shroud of Lost Souls
effect:
Armor • Unique
Order: Spend Shroud of Lost Souls, remove a character in any discard pile from the game, target a character within two ranks: The target must succeed with a magic save (DC 11 + Level of the removed character) or suffer a wound (two if this wizard is a Necromancer).

name: Sky
effect:
Dwarf / Priest of Kor
Spend React: Before a Dwarf you control makes a melee strike roll: The strike inflicts an additional wound.
"By now I'd really give a lot to see anything overhead. Anything."

name: Slash and Lunge
effect: React: After this rogue performs a melee strike that hit: Perform a melee strike against a spent character in the rank that was behind the target of the strike.
"What? You didn't think you'd see me here, friend?" - Talin Tzin

name: Stanley
effect:
Free Kingdoms
Stanley gains a bonus to ATK, AC, and Skill equal to the highest Level of an adjacent Free Kingdoms.
"My family is all dead, idiot."

name: Sudden Reversal
effect:
Tactics
React: After target character in your front rank is targeted with a melee strike: Move this fighter forward one rank or within this rank, if possible. If this fighter is adjacent to the target, redirect the melee strike to this fighter, if possible.

name: Surge
effect:
Dwarf • MEDICINE +0
Surge may equip fighter items.
React: After Surge kills an opposing character: Surge gains MEDICINE +5 until end of turn.
"There is twofold use for anatomical knowledge, I presume." - Kohn

name: The Beast Knight
effect:
Deverenian • RIDING +5
Your Warlord gains +2 to his initiative rolls.
"There is no winter in this blasted domain. All there is is ailing mounts, reeking sweat, and chafing armor."

name: The Seed
effect:
The Chosen • Thrall
Spend React: Once per turn, before The Seed is killed as part of an action's payment, stun The Seed: The Seed is not killed but the cost is considered paid.
"Properly sown, a crop may yield more than expected." - Naram-Sin

name: The Slightest Cut
effect:
Assassins gain +1 Level for performing this action.
React: Before making a melee strike roll: If the target of the strike has one or more wounds, gain +5 ATK for the strike and the strike inflicts an additional wound.

name: Thwarted
effect:
Spend React: After target character of equal or lower Level performs an action: Spend the target.
Spend React: After target spent character of equal or lower Level pays the costs of an action without spending: Cancel the action.

name: Tyyphera
effect:
Elf • Aquatic / Vaneris
While one or more Tyyphera are in your discard pile, if your Warlord is an Elf, opposing characters have -2 Skill.
Order: Once per turn, you may spend Tyyphera: Target character within two ranks must succeed with a poison save (DC 11, 15 if you spent Tyyphera) or suffer a wound.

name: Zaina's Treachery
effect: React: Before target character makes a melee strike roll targeting this rogue: This rogue may equip any number of items from your hand. Perform a melee strike against the target.
"I guess you didn't see THAT coming." - Gethseme Steelshard
